article_title: Paging Physician Assistants As Obamacare Fuels Demand

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: There is unprecedented demand for physician assistants as insurance payment and the Affordable Care Act encourage a team-based approach to managing the care of patient populations. A snapshot of this trend can be seen in a new report by The Medicus Firm, a national physician recruiter, which said physician assistants (PAs) [...]
